backend/main.mo: Defines PlateType and Order types, stores orders in a Map, and exposes createOrder plus read queries for single and all orders.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking feature IDs to frontend files and components used for Paytm QR and bill breakdown in the confirmation modal.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose, including modals, order form, styles, and WhatsApp utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/config styles defining color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via root div and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with navigation, promo popup, modals, order form, and WhatsApp auto-open or fallback handling after order creation.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: Plate selection and quantity form that validates minimum order and calls backend createOrder, returning the created order on success.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Displays order success details, bill summary, Paytm QR code, and optional WhatsApp fallback link with copy support.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Session-based promotional popup showing a momo offer with an Order Now action that scrolls to the order section.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: A modal component that displays a message, optional WhatsApp link actions, and prevents body scroll while open.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: React Query mutation hook that calls the backend to create an order and invalidates order-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables defining the appâ€™s color palette, animations, and layout defaults.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum plate rules for delivery and provides helper functions for validation and messaging.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp deep link with prefilled order details and provides a helper to open it in a new window.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, typography, container queries, and utilities.
project_state.json: Stores project requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and state metadata for development tracking.
